welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kirikhan, Turkey! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's historical charm, beautiful landscapes, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kirikhan has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cigerci cuma
restaurants.description: Cigerci cuma is a kebab restaurant located in Kırıkhan.

restaurants.address: Kanatlı Caddesi Menekse Sokak (Kanatlı Caddesi), 31440 Hatay

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hatay Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
